EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations - your friend joined BlueWave Community Solar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your sharing paid off! Great news! The friend you referred successfully joined a BlueWave Community Solar farm and you have both earned $100!
We will send you your $100 Visa Gift card to the billing address that we have on file for your account.
Good things come to those who share in saving the planet. Thanks for being part of the Community!
- All of us here at BlueWave
